channel.title: Need help fixing "restrictionX"
channel.description:
i would like to host restrictionX as a source but i seem to get the problem of this in my client run;
RestrictionX is loading.. java.io.IOException: Server returned HTTP response code: 403 for URL: http://res trictionx.org/RXCachev2.zip at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(NativeConstruct orAccessorImpl.java:57) at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(DelegatingC onstructorAccessorImpl.java:45) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Constructor.java:525) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(HttpURLConnection.j ava:1674) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(HttpURLConnection.j ava:1672) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getChainedException(HttpU RLConnection.java:1670) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLCon nection.java:1243) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:109) at Update.<init>(Update.java:27) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4802) at client.startUp(client.java:9087) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6109) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) Caused by: java.io.IOException: Server returned HTTP response code: 403 for URL: http://restrictionx.org/RXCachev2.zip at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLCon nection.java:1625) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getHeaderField(HttpURLCon nection.java:2677) at java.net.URLConnection.getHeaderFieldLong(URLConnection.java:639) at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLengthLong(URLConnection.java:511) at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLength(URLConnection.java:495) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:104)
Add me on skype if you know how to resolve this @ Lee.Adam9, from United Kingdom

item.title: Need help fixing "restrictionX"
item.dc:creator: @yvesdv yvesdv
item.description:
@yvesdv wrote:

Good luck using my source

Read full topic

item.title: Need help fixing "restrictionX"
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

403 is an http error meaning you are trying to access a webserver which you don’t have rights to enter. Meaning restrictionx doesn’t want leechers.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help fixing "restrictionX"
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

Most likely, If you have the cache try uploading it somewhere then posting that link there. If not then try using any 718+ cache

Read full topic

item.title: Need help fixing "restrictionX"
item.dc:creator: @phaloy phaloy
item.description:
@phaloy wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:520531”]You can’t access the directory for the cache, hence this:

java.io.IOException: Server returned HTTP response code: 403 for URL: http://restrictionx.org/RXCachev2.zip

HTTP response code 403 is a Forbidden error.[/quote]

So i gotta make a new link for the cache?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help fixing "restrictionX"
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You can’t access the directory for the cache, hence this:

java.io.IOException: Server returned HTTP response code: 403 for URL: http://restrictionx.org/RXCachev2.zip
HTTP response code 403 is a Forbidden error.

Read full topic
